data.quote: It can ruin your life only if it ruins your character.
data.author: Marcus Aurelius

data.quote: Let no one rob me of a single day who is not going to make me an adequate return for such a loss.
data.author: Seneca

data.quote: If your choices are beautiful, so too will you be.
data.author: Seneca

data.quote: Better to trip with the feet than with the tongue.
data.author: Zeno

data.quote: Don't seek for everything to happen as you wish it would, but rather wish that everything happens as it actually will - then your life will flow well.
data.author: Epicteus

data.quote: Joy comes to us from those whom we love even when they are absent.
data.author: Seneca
